title.newValue: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - Export Teams messages as individual messages

description.newValue:
Today with large cases in eDiscovery (Premium),
organizations have the ability to export Microsoft Teams conversations. For
many organizations, there is a need to export the searched messages as
individual messages. With this new feature, you will have an opportunity to
choose from exporting individual messages or whole conversations in eDiscovery
(Premium).
